properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 4:05AM MST until January 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Saturday. Strongest
winds tonight.

* IMPACTS...Dangerous crosswinds for high profile vehicles and
those pulling trailers.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The high winds will cause areas of blowing
snow tonight which may limit visibility to a half mile or less at
times. This may cause significant travel difficulty in the
Livingston vicinity on I-90.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Check the latest road reports before traveling
through the area as road detours or closures are possible.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY
